summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 47th Street from 15th avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8463 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
